CustomField.description:
"Setting this parameter does not consider CHF for the job. Value Apply - defaulted value represents the same scenario when paramter is not set at all. Value Exclude - does not consider CHF for the job Always apply CHF VAT to Insurer - same as Apply but CHF Vat is applied to Insurer
Apply = Claims Handling Fee always applied to all associated jobs
Exclude = Claims Handling Fee should not be applied to associated jobs
Always apply CHF VAT to Insurer = Claims Handling Fee always applies to all associated jobs and VAT for the Claims Handling Fee must be applied to the insurance account"
CustomField.label: Claims Handling Fee Setup

value.fullName: Always apply CHF VAT to Insurer
value.label: Always apply CHF to Insurer
